title.narrative: Infrastructure Development Investment Program for Tourism - Tranche 2

description.narrative:
As part of the Investment Program, this Project aims to complete subprojects under four or five different components of the Investment Program in the States of Uttarakand and Tamil Nadu.
A. Component 1: Urban Infrastructure and Service Improvement B. Component 2: Connectivity Improvement C. Component 3: Quality Enhancement of Natural and Cultural Attractions D. Component 4: Community-based Activities E. Component 5: Capacity Development, Community Participation and Project Management

Department of Tourism, Govt of Uttarakhand

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Enhanced tourism environment in Tamil Nadu and Uttarakhand.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
1,000 tourist/ month on average achieved at each of the new adventure/sports centers as well as the ecotourism-center at Kotdwar constructed under the Project

description.narrative: Enhanced tourism environment in Tamil Nadu and Uttarakhand.

title.narrative: 30% increased occupancy in the refurbished accommodation facilities and shelters at the tourist clusters

description.narrative: Enhanced tourism environment in Tamil Nadu and Uttarakhand.

title.narrative: At least 270 persons, including from female-headed, poor and vulnerable households, receive skilled employment (target: M-190/F-80)

description.narrative: Enhanced tourism environment in Tamil Nadu and Uttarakhand.
